titleStmt.title: A design of a British dictionary, historical and geographical with an essay, entituled, Archælogia Britannica: and a natural history of Wales. By Edward Lhwyd, keeper of the Ashmolean repository, Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Lhuyd, Edward, 1660-1709.

notesStmt.note: A circular inviting subscriptions to enable Lhuyd to undertake an extended antiquarian and scientific tour for five years. Cf. D.N.B.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
